editor.name: Editor
editor.option-spellcheck-description: Activeert spellingscontrole. Dit werkt momenteel alleen voor Amerikaans Engels.
editor.spellcheck-dict-empty: Het woordenboek voor spellingscontrole is momenteel leeg.
editor.option-readable-line-description: Beperk maximale regellengte. Hierdoor past er minder op het scherm, maar het maakt langere alinea's leesbaarder.
editor.option-strict-line-break-description: Negeer in voorbeeldmodus enkele regeleindes als volgens de Markdownspecificaties. Zet dit af om enkele regeleindes te tonen in het voorbeeld.
editor.option-show-frontmatter-description: Toon voorblad in de voorbeeldmodus als een codeblok. Schakel uit om het voorwerk-gedeelte te verbergen.
editor.option-auto-pair-markdown-description: Automatisch symbolen voor vet- en cursief drukken toevoegen.
editor.option-smart-indent-lists-description: Automatisch inspringen en opmaken van lijsten.
editor.option-fold-heading-description: Alles onder een kop kan opgevouwen worden.
editor.option-fold-indent-description: Laat je een deel van hetzelfde ingesprongen stuk opvouwen, zoals een lijst.
editor.option-default-new-pane-mode-description: De standaard modus waarin een nieuw paneel wordt geopend.
editor.option-use-tabs-description: Gebruik inspringen om in te springen wanneer de"Tab"-toets gebruikt wordt. Schakel dit uit om spaties te gebruiken.
editor.option-tab-size-description: Het aantal spaties dat een tab breed is.
editor.option-line-wrap-description: Laat lange regels teruglopen zodat ze in het venster passen, zonder van links naar rechts te hoeven scrollen.
editor.option-auto-convert-html-description: Zet automatisch HTML naar Markdown om wanneer inhoud van een website via drag-and-drop ingevoegd wordt. Gebruik Ctrl/Cmd+Shift+V om te plakken zonder het om te zetten.
editor.option-vim-key-bindings-description: Hiermee gebruikt u Vim-sneltoetsen bij het bewerken van het bronbestand..
editor.option-emacsy-keys-description: Laat je extra Emacs-stijl navigatietoetsen gebruiken, die standaard zijn op macOS, maar voor problemen kunnen zorgen met andere sneltoetsen.
editor.label-vim-warning: Vim-modus is efficiënt voor tekstbewerking maar kan verwarrend zijn. Als je niet bekend bent met Vim, kan deze optie ervoor zorgen dat het lijkt alsof Obsidian niet meer werkt
editor.label-vim-test: Om te bevestigen dat je weet hoe Vim werkt, voer hieronder de opdracht in om Vim te sluiten zonder op te slaan:
editor.msg-vim-mode-enabled: Opdracht is correct. Vim-modus is nu aan.
editor.msg-vim-mode-not-enabled: Opdracht is incorrect. Vim-mode blijft uit om jou te beschermen.
editor.msg-vim-mode-please-enter-command: Voer de opdracht in om Vim-modus aan te zetten

file.name: Bestanden & Links
file.option-confirm-file-deletion-description: Wilt u gevraagd worden of het bestand moet worden verwijderd?
file.option-delete-destination-description: Wat te doen met bestanden nadat ze zijn verwijderd.
file.option-always-update-links-description: Of links automatisch moeten worden bijgewerkt na het hernoemen van een bestand of prompt.
file.option-new-note-location-description: Locatie waar nieuwe notities moeten bewaard. Plugin-instellingen zullen dit overschrijven.
file.option-choice-current-folder: Dezelfde map waarin het bestand zich bevindt
file.option-new-file-folder-path: Map om nieuwe notities in te maken
file.option-new-file-folder-path-description: Nieuwe notities verschijnen in deze map. Plugin-instellingen zullen dit overschrijven.
file.option-use-wiki-links-description: Automatisch genereren van Wikilinks voor [[links]] en ![[images]] in plaats van Markdown links en afbeeldingen. Schakel deze optie uit om daarvoor in de plaats Markdown links te genereren.
file.option-show-unsupported-files-descriptio: Show files with any extension even if Obsidian can't open them natively, so that you can link to them and see them in File Explorer and Quick Switcher.
file.option-link-autocompleted-format-descrip: Welke links moeten worden ingevoegd bij het automatisch genereren van interne links.
file.option-new-attachment-location-descripti: Where newly added attachments are placed.
file.option-attachment-folder-path-descriptio: Nieuwe bijlages verschijnen hier. Deze omvatten oa afbeeldingen die zijn gemaakt via slepen en plaatsen of plakken, en audio-opnamen.
file.option-attachment-subfolder-path-descrip: If your file is under "vault/folder", and your set subfolder name to "attachments", attachments will be saved to "vault/folder/attachments".

appearance.name: Uiterlijk
appearance.option-base-theme-description: Kies het standaard kleurenschema voor Obsidian.
appearance.option-use-obsidian-css-description: Lees en pas “obsidian.css” toe in de kluismap. Dit is een legacy instelling, aub overweeg om uw aangepaste CSS-bestand naar de fragmentmap hieronder te verplaatsen.
appearance.option-community-themes-description: Bekijk en gebruik geweldige thema's die door de community zijn gemaakt.
appearance.option-font-size-description: Font size in pixels that affects editor and preview.
appearance.option-font-size-action-description: Adjust the font size using Ctrl + Scroll, or using the trackpad pinch-zoom gesture.
appearance.option-manage-themes-description: Manage installed themes and browse community themes.
appearance.label-no-css-snippets-found: Geen CSS-fragmenten gevonden in de fragmentenmap.

hotkeys.name: Sneltoetsen
hotkeys.tooltip-hotkey-multiple-conflicts: This hotkey conflicts with {{count}} other commands

about.name: Over
about.label-manual-install-required: U moet de nieuwste versie handmatig installeren.
about.label-new-version-ready: Een nieuwe versie is klaar om te worden geïnstalleerd.
about.label-relaunch-to-update: Herstart de applicatie om bij te werken.
about.option-auto-update-description: Schakel dit uit om te voorkomen dat de applicatie op updates controleert.
about.option-insider-build-description: Automatische update naar insider-builds om nieuwe functies uit te proberen. Merk op dat deze builds geavanceerd en mogelijk minder stabiel zijn.
about.option-hw-acceleration-description: Turns on Hardware Acceleration, which uses your GPU to make Obsidian smoother.
about.option-hw-acceleration-warning: If you turn this off, app performance will be severely degraded.
about.option-config-location-description: Use a different config folder than the default one. Must start with a dot.
about.option-config-location-warning: Config location must be a valid folder name that starts with a dot.
about.label-commercial-license-info: Geregistreerd aan "{{company}}" voor {{seats}} gebruikers. Geldig tot {{expiry}}.
about.label-free-personal-license: Persoonlijke licentie: vrij te gebruiken voor eigen gebruik.

account.name: Account
account.label-insider-build-access: Bedankt voor uw ondersteuning. U hebt toegang tot onze insider-builds.
account.message-login-failed: Inloggen mislukt, controleer uw e-mail en wachtwoord nogmaals.
account.message-get-community-badges-instruction: For Discord and forum badges, please refer to {{link}}.
account.message-obtain-commercial-license: Voor een commerciële licentie gaat u naar {{pricingPageLink}}.

core-plugin.option-search-plugin-description: Filter plugins by name or description.

third-party-plugin.name: Externe plugin
third-party-plugin.option-safe-mode-description-on: Veilige Modus is AAN. Alle community-plug-ins zijn uitgeschakeld.
third-party-plugin.option-safe-mode-description-off: Veilige Modus is UIT. Community-plug-ins kunnen nu worden ingeschakeld.
third-party-plugin.option-browse-community-plugins-descript: Blader door en installeer plug-ins van derden die zijn gemaakt door onze geweldige community.
third-party-plugin.label-third-party-plugin-warning: Externe plug-ins hebben toegang tot bestanden op uw computer, maken verbinding met internet en kunnen zelfs extra programma's installeren.
third-party-plugin.label-disable-safe-mode-confirmation: Wilt u de Veilige Modus uitschakelen om deze plug-ins toe te staan?
third-party-plugin.label-select-a-plugin: Selecteer een plug-in om te installeren of lees er meer over
third-party-plugin.msg-failed-load-plugins: Het laden van communityplug-ins is mislukt.
third-party-plugin.label-unsupported: This plugin does not support your device.
third-party-plugin.msg-reloaded-third-party-plugins: Opnieuw laden vam plug-ins van derden.
third-party-plugin.label-uninstall-plugin-confirmation: Weet u zeker dat u deze plug-in wilt verwijderen? Hierdoor wordt de map van de plug-in ook verwijderd.
third-party-plugin.option-search-installed-plugin-descripti: Filter installed plugins by name or description.

mobile-toolbar.name: Mobile toolbar
mobile-toolbar.option-configure-quick-action-descriptio: Configure which command to trigger when pull down from the top. The current command is set to "{{command}}".
mobile-toolbar.option-add-command-description: Select any global command to add to the toolbar.

print-modal.title: Exporteer naar PDF
print-modal.caption: Exporteer "{{filename}}" naar PDF met de instelling hierbeneden.

interface.empty-sidebar: De zijbalk is leeg, probeer hier een venster naartoe te slepen.
interface.msg-file-changed: "{{file}}" is ergens anders gewijzigd, automatisch veranderingen samenvoegen.
interface.msg-upgrade-installer: Om deze functie te gebruiken, moet u deze opnieuw installeren met het nieuwste installatieprogramma dat beschikbaar is op onze website.
interface.msg-indexing:
Obsidian is indexing your vault...
This should only happen once.
Some functionality may not be available until this is complete.

empty-state.unknown-pane-desc: The plugin that created this pane ({{type}}) has gone away

menu.edit-view: Bewerk (Ctrl/Cmd+Klik om te bewerken in een nieuw venster)
menu.preview-view: Voorbeschouwen (Ctrl/Cmd+Klik om een nieuw venster te openen)

tooltip.not-created-yet: Not created yet, select to create

start-screen.option-open-folder-as-vault-description: Kies een bestaande map met Markdown-bestanden.
start-screen.option-create-vault-description: Creëer een nieuwe Obsidian-kluis in een map.
start-screen.option-new-vault-name-description: Kies een naam voor je geweldige kluis.
start-screen.option-new-vault-location-description: Pick a place to put your new vault.
start-screen.msg-failed-to-create-vault-at-location: Could not create vault at the given location. Please double check the location and permission.
start-screen.msg-error-remove-current-open-vault: Can't remove a currently open vault.

start-up.obsidian-load-error: An error occurred while loading Obsidian.

commands.open-cursor-link-in-new-pane: Open link under cursor in new pane
commands.navigate-pane-left: Focus on pane to the left
commands.navigate-pane-right: Focus on pane to the right
commands.toggle-fold: Toggle fold on the current line

dialogue.label-confirm-update-link-to-file: Do you want to update internal links that link to this file?
dialogue.label-confirm-deletion: Are you sure you want to delete "{{filename}}"?
dialogue.label-move-to-system-trash: It will be moved to your system trash.
dialogue.label-move-to-vault-trash: It will be moved to your Obsidian trash, which is located in the ".trash" hidden folder in your vault.
dialogue.label-permanent-delete: The file will be permanent deleted.
dialogue.label-delete-folder-warning: If you continue, all files inside this folder will be deleted.
dialogue.label-existing-backlink: There are currently {{links}} pointing to this note.

file-explorer.name: File explorer
file-explorer.desc: See all the files in your vault.
file-explorer.action-reveal-active-file: Reveal active file in file explorer
file-explorer.label-sort-a-to-z: Sort by file name (A to Z)
file-explorer.label-sort-z-to-a: Sort by file name (Z to A)
file-explorer.label-sort-new-to-old: Sort by edit time (new to old)
file-explorer.label-sort-old-to-new: Sort by edit time (old to new)
file-explorer.msg-invalid-characters: File name cannot contain any of the following characters:
file-explorer.msg-unsafe-characters: Links will not work with file names containing any of these characters:
file-explorer.msg-file-already-exists: There's already a file with the same name
file-explorer.msg-set-attachment-folder: Attachments will be saved to "{{path}}" from now on.

search.name: Search
search.desc: Search for keyword in all the notes.
search.option-show-path-description: Display full path of the file rather than just the file name.
search.option-link-style-description: Optionally turn each file result in to a link.
search.option-list-prefix-description: Optionally add a list item prefix to each file result.

quick-switcher.name: Quick switcher
quick-switcher.desc: Jump to any files without leaving your keyboard. Ctrl/Cmd+O to activate.
quick-switcher.label-no-note-create-new: No notes found. Enter to create a new one.
quick-switcher.prompt-type-file-name: Type file to switch to or create...
quick-switcher.tooltip-not-created-yet: Not created yet, select to create
quick-switcher.option-show-existing-only-description: Whether to show links to files that are not yet created.
quick-switcher.option-show-attachments-desc: Show attachment files like images, videos, and PDFs.
quick-switcher.option-show-all-file-types-desc: Show all files including ones that Obsidian can't open. The file will be opened with the default app for that file type.

graph-view.name: Graph view
graph-view.desc: See a graph overview of which notes link to which.
graph-view.option-depth-description: Show nodes this number of links away
graph-view.option-show-tags-description: Tags are linked to the files that contain them
graph-view.option-show-existing-files-only-descript: When checked, links to nonexistent files are not shown
graph-view.option-show-orphans-description: Show files that are not linked to any other file
graph-view.tooltip-click-to-change-drag-to-reorder:
Click to change color
Drag to reorder groups

backlinks.name: Backlinks
backlinks.desc: Show number of backlinks in the status bar.
backlinks.action-open-for-current: Open backlinks for the current file

outgoing-links.name: Outgoing Links
outgoing-links.desc: Show outgoing links and detect unlinked mentions of other notes in the current note.
outgoing-links.action-open-for-current: Open outgoing links for the current file

tag-pane.name: Tag pane
tag-pane.desc: Displays all your tags and along with their number of occurrences.

page-preview.name: Page preview
page-preview.desc: Preview a note when hovering an internal link. Ctrl/Cmd + hover in editor mode.
page-preview.label-empty-note: "{{linktext}}" is not created yet. Click to create.
page-preview.label-require-mod: Require {{key}} to trigger page preview on hover

starred.name: Starred
starred.desc: Star frequently used files and searches.

custom-css.name: Custom CSS
custom-css.desc: Reads "obsidian.css" in the vault and applies it.
custom-css.msg-load-error: Could not load community themes, please check your network.
custom-css.msg-now-using-theme: You're now using {{title}} as your CSS theme.

command-palette.name: Command palette
command-palette.desc: Type a command to invoke it. No need to use the UI or remember the shortcut.
command-palette.option-add-new-pin-description: Pinned commands will appear at the top of all commands when no search query is present.

markdown-format-importer.name: Markdown format importer
markdown-format-importer.desc: Convert Markdown from other apps to Obsidian format.
markdown-format-importer.zettelkasten-link-fixer-description: Fixes "[[UID]]" links to full "[[UID File Name]]".
markdown-format-importer.zettelkasten-link-beautifier-description: Fixes "[[UID]]" links and also beautify them "[[UID File Name|File Name]]".
markdown-format-importer.msg-all-files-warning: Warning: the importer will convert all the files in your vault, not just the current file.
markdown-format-importer.msg-override-files-warning: Your files will be overwritten. Back up all your files before attempting conversion.

daily-notes.name: Daily notes
daily-notes.desc: Open today's daily note, or create one if not present.
daily-notes.msg-fail-format: Failed to create daily note. "{{format}}" is not a valid format.
daily-notes.msg-fail-folder: Failed to create daily note. Folder "{{folderOption}}" not found.
daily-notes.msg-fail-template-file: Failed to create daily note. Template file "{{template}}" not found.
daily-notes.msg-no-previous: There's no daily note before this one.
daily-notes.msg-no-next: There's no daily note after this one.
daily-notes.label-syntax-live-preview: Here is what it will look like:
daily-notes.option-new-file-location-description: The folder path to create the new daily note.
daily-notes.option-template-description: The file path to use as template.
daily-notes.option-open-on-start-description: Open your daily note automatically whenever you open this vault.

zettelkasten-prefixer.name: Zettelkasten prefixer
zettelkasten-prefixer.desc: Create a new note with the 12-digit Zettelkasten ID format YYYYMMDDHHII (Example 202001010000).
zettelkasten-prefixer.option-new-file-location-description: The folder path to create the new Zettelkasten note.
zettelkasten-prefixer.msg-folder-not-found: Failed to create Zettelkasten note. Folder "{{folderOption}}" not found.
zettelkasten-prefixer.option-template-file-description: The file path to use as template.
zettelkasten-prefixer.msg-template-file-not-found: Failed to create Zettelkasten note. Template file "{{template}}" not found.

random-note.name: Random note
random-note.desc: Opens a random note. Useful for reviewing and discovering.

outline.name: Outline
outline.desc: Displays the outline of the current file or linked pane.
outline.action-open-for-current: Open outline of the current file

word-count.name: Word count
word-count.desc: Show word count in the status bar.

slides.name: Slides
slides.desc: Present from Markdown. Use "---" to separate slides.

audio-recorder.name: Audio recorder
audio-recorder.desc: Record audio and save as attachment.
audio-recorder.msg-access-denied: Microphone access was denied, please enable it from the preference pane.
audio-recorder.msg-pending-grant: Please grant microphone permission to start recording.

open-with-default-app.name: Open in default app
open-with-default-app.desc: Add button to open current file in the default app.

templates.name: Templates
templates.desc: Insert template content from a folder of template files.
templates.option-template-folder-location-descript: Files in this folder will be available as templates.
templates.option-template-date-format-description: {{date}} in the template file will be replaced with this value.
templates.option-template-date-format-description2: You can also use {{date:YYYY-MM-DD}} to override the format once.
templates.option-template-time-format-description: {{time}} in the template file will be replaced with this value.
templates.option-template-time-format-description2: You can also use {{time:HH:mm}} to override the format once.
templates.msg-fail-invalid-folder: Failed to list templates. Template folder is invalid.
templates.msg-fail-folder-not-found: Failed to list templates. Folder "{{folderOption}}" not found.

translucency.name: Translucent window
translucency.desc: Turn on translucency effect to enhance a sense of depth. Best used with dark mode. Not supported on Linux.

slash-command.name: Slash commands
slash-command.desc: Enable the ability to trigger slash commands in the editor by typing the forward slash.

publish.name: Publish
publish.desc: Publish your notes through Obsidian Publish.
publish.label-no-internet-access: You need access to the internet to publish changes.
publish.label-publish-service-description: Obsidian Publish is an add-on paid service that lets you publish your notes online directly from Obsidian.
publish.label-please-login: To start publishing, please log in or create a new Obsidian account.
publish.label-no-publish-subscription: You do not have an Obsidian Publish subscription yet.
publish.label-delete-site-confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this site?
publish.label-delete-site-details: This will immediately and permanently delete your site.
publish.option-site-id-description: Your site will be at https://publish.obsidian.md/{site id}. You can change this later. Only lower case letters, numbers, and dashes are allowed.
publish.msg-invalid-site-id: Site ID can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and dashes.
publish.msg-site-id-in-use: This site ID is in use, please try another one.
publish.msg-create-site-issue: That was an issue when creating your site.
publish.option-site-name-description: Name of your published site. It will show up in the page title of your site.
publish.option-home-page-file-description: The first page the user sees when landing on your published site
publish.option-logo-description: Pick an image file as your site logo.
publish.option-logo-placeholder: Any any uploaded image in your vault...
publish.option-theme-description: Choose default color scheme for your site.
publish.option-show-navigation-description: Display a list of all published pages on the left side of your published site.
publish.option-show-search-description: Display a search bar at top of the navigation that lets the visitors search pages and headings on your site.
publish.option-show-graph-description: Display a small local graph on each page.
publish.option-show-outline-description: Display the outline of headings on each page.
publish.option-show-backlinks-description: Show backlink section at the end of each page.
publish.option-sliding-window-mode-description: Open pages in new panes to the right. Allows scrolling through panes horizontally.
publish.option-hover-preview-file-description: Display page preview when hovering links.
publish.option-readable-line-length-description: Limit maximum line length. Fits less content on the screen, but makes long paragraphs more readable.
publish.option-site-password-description: Restrict access to your site with passwords.
publish.option-google-analytics-description: Configure Google Analytics for your site. Only available for visitors from your custom domain URL. Please check with your local laws and regulations first.
publish.tooltip-add-linked: Add all files that are linked by currently selected items
publish.msg-no-permission-to-publish-to-site: You do not have permissions to publish to the current site.
publish.msg-select-at-least-one-file: Please select at least one file.
publish.label-clear-cache: It takes up to a few minutes for the changes to show up on your site. If you do not see your latest changes, try clearing the cache in your browser.
publish.label-visit-site: You can visit your site here:
publish.msg-something-went-wrong: Something went wrong. Please check the developer console for details.
publish.label-no-password: Your site currently does not have any passwords. Anyone can visit it.
publish.label-have-password: Your site is password protected. If you have multiple passwords, visitors can access your site by entering any of them.
publish.option-password-desc: A hash of your password will be stored securely. Once the password is set, it cannot be revealed in plaintext.
publish.option-nickname-desc: Set a nickname to remind yourself what or who the password is for.
publish.option-custom-domain-desc: Use your own domain rather than the https://publish.obsidian.md/{site id} URL.
publish.option-noindex-desc: Prevent search engines from indexing your site.
publish.option-custom-url-desc: The URL that your site will be located at.
publish.option-custom-url-redirect-desc: Redirect visitors on publish.obsidian.md/id to your custom domain.
publish.label-custom-domain-instructions: Please refer to our {{link}} on our help site for more information.

workspaces.name: Workspaces
workspaces.msg-please-enter-name: Please enter a name for the new workspace.

sync.name: Sync
sync.desc: Synchronize your files through Obsidian Sync.
sync.msg-already-latest-version: This version is already the latest version.
sync.label-no-earlier-version: There was no earlier versions of this file.
sync.label-click-to-see-history: Click on a deleted file to see its history.
sync.label-remote-vault-explanation: Remote vaults securely synchronize your vault between devices.
sync.option-vault-name-desc: Helps you remember what this vault is for.
sync.option-use-custom-encryption-password-de: If you turn this off, we will securely manage an encryption key for you.
This option cannot be changed later.
sync.option-encryption-password-desc: This password cannot be changed later.
sync.option-encryption-password-desc-warning: If you forget this password, any remote data will remain unusable forever.
sync.option-encryption-password-desc-2: This does not affect your local data.
sync.label-confirm-delete-remote-vault-questi: Are you sure you want to delete this remote vault?
sync.label-confirm-delete-remote-vault-result: All data on our server, including version history, will be deleted. Your local files will stay intact.
sync.label-confirm-delete-remote-vault-warnin: This action is permanent and irreversible.
sync.label-not-remote-vaults: You don't have any remote vaults.
sync.options-only-show-errors-desc: Only show errors and hide other log items.
sync.label-no-sync-subscription: You do not have an Obsidian Sync subscription yet.
sync.option-pick-remote-vault-desc-connected: Currently connected to the "{{name}}" remote vault.
sync.option-pick-remote-vault-desc-not-connec: Currently not connected to any remote vault.
sync.option-device-name-desc: This name will be displayed in the sync log. Leave empty to use the default name.
sync.option-sync-log-desc: View recent sync activities for debugging.
sync.option-over-size-desc: Your vault is at {{size}} out of {{limit}}.
sync.msg-largest-files-desc: These are the remote files that are taking the most space. After deleting attachments, use the purge button to free up remote vault space.
sync.tooltip-purge-remote: Permanently purge deleted attachments from remote vault to save space.
sync.option-excluded-folder-desc: Prevent certain folders from being synced.
sync.option-sync-image-desc: Sync image files with these extensions: {{extensions}}.
sync.option-sync-audio-desc: Sync audio files with these extensions: {{extensions}}.
sync.option-sync-video-desc: Sync video files with these extensions: {{extensions}}.
sync.option-view-config-files-desc: View and restore version history of setting files.
sync.option-sync-app-desc: Enable to sync editor settings, files & links settings, custom hotkeys, etc.
sync.option-sync-appearance-desc: Sync appearance settings like dark mode, active theme, and enabled snippets.
sync.option-sync-appearance-data-desc: Sync downloaded themes and snippets. Whether they are enabled depends on the previous setting.
sync.option-sync-core-plugin-desc: Sync which core plugins are enabled.
sync.option-sync-community-plugin-desc: Sync which community plugins are enabled.
sync.option-sync-community-plugin-data-desc: Sync installed community plugins (.js, .css, and manifest.json files) and their settings.
sync.label-sync-introduction: Obsidian Sync is Obsidian's add-on sync service with end-to-end encryption and version history.
sync.label-account-required: To start syncing, please log in or create a new Obsidian account.
sync.label-number-of-folders-excluded: {{folders}} are currently excluded from being synced.
sync.msg-vault-has-notes: Your local vault already contains some notes.
sync.msg-merge-warning: If you connect to the remote vault "{{name}}", notes in your local vault will be merged with notes from your remote vault.

file-recovery.name: File recovery
file-recovery.desc: Let you restore recent snapshots to recover from accidental data loss. Snapshots are only saved for Markdown files.
file-recovery.option-interval-description: Minimal interval in minutes between two snapshots.
file-recovery.option-keep-description: Length in days snapshots is kept for.
file-recovery.label-clear-warning: Are you sure you want to delete all snapshots? Note that only snapshots will be removed. All files inside your vault will not be affected.
file-recovery.label-select-file: Please select a file on the left to view snapshots.

note-composer.name: Note composer
note-composer.option-split-replacement-text-descriptio: What to show in place of the selected text after extracting it.
note-composer.option-template-file-description: Template file to use when merging or extracting. Available variables: {{content}}, {{fromTitle}}, {{newTitle}}, {{date:FORMAT}}, e.g. {{date:YYYY-MM-DD}}.
note-composer.command-merge-file: Merge current file with another file...
note-composer.label-confirm-file-merge: Are you sure you want to merge "{{file}}" into "{{destination}}"? "{{file}}" will be deleted.
note-composer.msg-fail-to-fetch-template: Failed to fetch template file: "{{template}}" not found.
